projects.name: Canari digital instrument cluster
projects.description: Touch screen vehicle data dashboard capable of handling different data streams and allowing the customer to design and configure the instrument gauges on custom screens

items.description: Led two other front-end developers using Scrum and worked with the server team to align websocket API

Architected the Canari web framework minimizing build-time changes required by the end user by creating a configuration flat-file structure for easy, dynamic run-time changes including - adding screens, widget layout, and theme configuring

projects.name: Obeya room
projects.description: Set up room with business strategy, supply chain, operations, people, quality and finance metrics for a customer's engine manufacturing plant

items.description: Created multiple slides showcasing data in the various core areas

projects.name: Instrument Database
projects.description: Database to hold all the calibrated sensors used for testing

items.description: Created an excel-based database to house the records and created visual cues for upcoming calibration and maintenance and external links to documentation

projects.name: Wifi Garage
projects.description: Modified garage door to be controlled using Wifi

items.description: Hosted the interface site on my Raspberry Pi
Created a simple web site to see the status of the garage door and allow me to trigger it remotely
Using Particle Electron Wifi MCU and reverse-engineering the garage door remote circuit and position sensing, designed a way to trigger the garage to open and close

Wrote embedded application in Particle's toolkit to periodically check for door state and track the times that the door was last opened and closed. Also set up IFTTT to handle voice-controlled operation

projects.name: Construction data integration
projects.description: Data from multiple customer business units in construction was combined to create a holistic business view

items.description: Create a database to house part-level data from three different business units. The data was organized differently, so multiple queries and aggregations were required to consolidate the data
Created multiple views from the data including network flow maps and supplier/customer/facility footprint maps

projects.name: Piston ring face chipping
projects.description: Engine piston ring chipping occurring during operation

items.description: Analyzed several piston rings that had chips to determine the potential causes - operating, material handling or installation

Compiled a complete report of all piston rings that were found to have chipping after running them. The report was delivered to the piston ring supplier as evidence of the faulty parts and management recognized my efforts in tracking down the cause of the ring chipping

projects.name: Piston groove wear
projects.description: Piston ring grooves were wearing during testing faster than expected

items.description: Reviewed

projects.name: Manufacturing and design cost reduction
projects.description: Investigated ways to reduce a customer's manufacturing cost by looking for part similarities and flow of material through the plant

items.description: Created flow of parts from suppliers to the manufacturing plant
Used a VBA macro to auto generate family part tables in Excel from a raw data set.

projects.name: Mining vehicle navigation
projects.description: Worked along-side our customer to modernize their current touch-screen navigation-based application. Updated the C++ communication libraries and migrated the UI from an older technology to HTML5

items.description: Led two member scrum team prioritizing feature deployment and assisting technically and as customer liaison
Architected the application focusing on the screen, vehicle and map transformations to properly update the screen contents to reflect changes in mine-site vehicle and object position changes.
Created advanced zooming exponential decay algorithm to control zooming between user zoom clicks

projects.name: Supply chain network modeling
projects.description: Network model used to show flow of parts throughout the supply chain

items.description: Created a tree-traverse script to generate sourcing policies and BoM inputs for Supply Chain Guru from the customer's BoM
Generated facility footprint and material flow from the processed BoM data

projects.name: Engine Data Analysis Tool
projects.description: Tool to read, plot and analyze engine data

items.description: Developed a Matlab UI to: read csv test data, plot the time-series data, add calculated channels and time-align lagging channels. The interface also allowed users to run emissions calculations from the collected data to determine cycle PM, smoke and NOx numbers.

projects.name: Wifi Outlet
projects.description: Wifi-controlled outlet with custom electronics and website interface

items.description: Designed the Particle circuit including an AC-DC converter, 120V relay and an LED circuit in EAGLE and ordered the PCB and soldered
Basic website used to show the state of the outlet and to toggle it on and off
Printed the enclosure and packaged it together with the electronics
Wrote the Particle SW to switch the 120V relay in addition to showing different LED states including on, off and pulsing
Designed the enclosure in Fusion360 making sure it would be safe to handle the 120V-powered device

projects.name: Oil consumption meter
projects.description: Device used to measure how fast the oil is burned in an engine during testing

items.description: Designed the circuit board with Atmega32U4, ADC, DAC, MAX232 and pressure sensor ICs and did all SMT soldering

Wrote the core algorithms to convert ultrasonic level sensor data to oil mass and adding a coefficient to compensate for temperature fluctuations. Supported offshore team to implement other IC communication libraries

Created the business case to start the project and project plan. Acted as PM tracking action items and keeping deliverables on track. Worked with overseas team to develop C#.NET UI to communicate with meter, graph and log data asynchronously. Worked with design engineer and fabricators to design and build unit and BoM structure
Create marketing material to showcase the specs of the product and key features
Wrote a white paper discussing the multiple methods used in the engine testing to collect oil consumption data, the pitfalls and what makes ARi's meter stand out
Field requests from potential customers to use our product to collect oil data and visit customer sites to showcase the product

Created a test plan of to validate multiple features of the system collecting data with data acquisition systems, validating voltages with multimeters, and performing mechanical robustness tests including drop and pressure checking. Visit a customer site to collect oil consumption data on their engine with our product

projects.name: Truck Competitive Analysis
projects.description: Customer approached us to benchmark a competitor's semi truck's EPA Tier IV emissions performance and strategies

items.description: Compiled the findings from the testing and data analysis into a 100-page report

Develop list and location of sensors to instrument truck and connect to data acquisition system. Collect data while riding in the truck around the Midwest and to Colorado for high altitude. Analyze data to understand various emissions strategies.

projects.name: Generator desktop configuration tool
projects.description: Tool used to view and configure generators using Modbus TCP

items.description: Designed app as a demo to show customer. Completed it within one week to showcase to customer
Created multiple slides showing the need for the product, the key features of the app, and the proposed development roadmap. Presented twice to different customer audiences
Designed UI using React incorporating multiple Material UI components and ran inside of an Electron app with Express routing logic for saving and opening configuration files.

projects.name: GL Renovations
projects.description: Construction contracting website

items.description: Designed a MongoDB noSQL database to house the pictures and other content for the website
Hosted the website at home on a headless Raspberry Pi
Mobile-responsive website utilizing a custom React-based CMS tool for the owner to add pictures and update content, and a Node with Express server for file system interaction and serving content

projects.name: Piano table
projects.description: Console table in our home that has three false drawers that conceal a slide-out music keyboard

items.description: Developed a complete 3D CAD model in Fusion 360, created all of the drawings and BoM in order to purchase components

projects.name: Engine Test Procedures
projects.description: Detailed documents listing requirements, steps and outcomes of various heavy-duty engine tests

items.description: Gather facility engine test experts to capture knowledge validation best practices that differs from current documentation
Organize notes from discussions and make modifications to the documents

projects.name: Project portfolio
projects.description: What you're looking at now! Visual project portfolio tool for tracking and displaying project work

items.description: Designed SaaS tool to allow users to enter their project work assigning skills and tools. Created visualizations from the data and a CDN API to allow the user to embed the visualization into another website
Designed a GraphQL database to house all the records with one-to-many relationships for the project skills and skill categories

projects.name: Satellite images in mining and construction
projects.description: Using satellite images to improve site visibility and calculate production for mines and construction industries

items.description: With help from manager, created strategy for using images of various quality at different places within the industry and compiled into information to communicate with the customer
Processed GIS images and performed 3D rendering of images

projects.name: Engine cold start testing
projects.description: Cold soak an engine for several hours and test the performance on start-up

items.description: Start the engine monitoring the starter performance and excess smoking. Also tweaked performance maps to improve starting

projects.name: Canari swipe
projects.description: 100% React-based swiping library

items.description: To support the Canari instrument cluster project, created a swiping library to handle click and touch events to seemlessly move between screens. Considered multiple scenarios including swiping back, deceleration, multiple selections, etc.

projects.name: Product Development Process
projects.description: Develop ARi's PDP to more effectively streamline the activities required to develop products and solutions in preparation for the market

items.description: Working with our global team, documented all the current steps we follow. Comparing with other industry best practices and looking for ways to make it more efficient, simplified and listed all the steps with required participants and dependencies
With the documented PDP and PLM processes, communicated with the global products team the process and helped engineers follow the process
Developed a Part Lifecycle Management (PLM) process including how to name part numbers, and a simply part database to store unique parts globally.

projects.name: C3PO CRM Tool
projects.description: Internal Customer Relationship Management tool

items.description: Created 'Customers, Proposals, Projects and Purchase Orders) database using an Access web app connecting the tables together and creating forms for data entry
Explained to the lead managers how to use the tool for inputting their data and how to pull reports

projects.name: Motor test bench
projects.description: Test bench used to select and validate the DC motor used in the electric actuator project

items.description: Worked with fabrication to build the testing bench to the design.
Collected motor speed and load data at various temperatures and created performance charts of various motors

Designed the test bench including how the motor is mounted, the drive shaft connected to the hysteresis brake and the load cell attached to the lever arm. Selected all of the required components and packaged them together.
Created the motor controller H-bridge circuit and load cell amplification circuit designing the PCB for final packaging. Also added BLE support for controlling the test bench remotely.

projects.name: Supplier performance dashboard
projects.description: Excel-based dashboards showing demand vs. capacity gap sent to 50 different suppliers monthly

items.description: Previously the supplier dashboard creation process was manual, so created a VBA script to read in the new data, update the charts and create an outputted dashboard to be sent to the suppliers
Analyze supply gap to make observations for the team

projects.name: Engine part 3D map
projects.description: Engine serial number and part number quantity 3D map

items.description: Read thousands of engine serial number and part number data sets and combine them into a consolidate 3D map

projects.name: Push to pull ordering
projects.description: Helped customer understand the current part ordering system and help organize the data in order to convert from a push to a pull-style ordering

items.description: Documented the current part ordering status and mapped it out through the facility
Created a database that took part lead time, days-on-hand and inventory and combined into a database to help determine which parts can be converted from push to pull ordering

projects.name: Piston temp plug measurement
projects.description: Temp plugs are used to measure maximum temperatures of various locations around a piston

items.description: Set up an objective method to consistently measure the depths that the temp plugs were inserted using CMM and later refined the process to make it faster

projects.name: RV business evaluation
projects.description: A RV business hired us to understand their business, create business improvement metrics and put new processes in place to improve their business

items.description: Talked with multiple employees responsible for RV servicing to understand ways to reduce waste, improve material flow and increase service

projects.name: Mining Telematics Dashboards
projects.description: Touch screen application used by large trucks and loaders on surface mining sites that displays cycle time and efficiency data to the operator.

items.description: Won SW project by discussing our capabilities with the customer. Later won bracket and harness work as well.
Designed the electrical harness that connects the touch screen displays to the end-user mining truck and loader

Forked from Canari, user interface dashboards grabbing data through socket communication with customer's server to Node, Linux OS handling for display brightness and LEDs, http and websocket communication to the front-end React application and state management to update the display as new information is received.

Led implementation of some of the product features, worked with ARi fabrication team to build mounting brackets and harnesses per the customer's request. Created a workbook shared with the team including accounting to seamlessly track customer requests through invoicing

projects.name: Chair encoder
projects.description: Designed an encoder to measure and output the position of an office swivel chair for demonstrating our capabilities

items.description: Printed out the rotary encoder disc and mounting brackets on our 3D printer
Wrote encoder quadrature algorithm with the two LED position inputs and outputted a processed position PWM signal to be read in by another controller
Using two LEDs, a flashlight and an Arduino, created a custom encoder circuit that would measure chair rotation within five degrees resolution
Designed an encoder disc that would allow the LEDs to pick up the change in rotation of the chair and created a bracket to mount it all to the underside of a chair

projects.name: BLDC Motor Design
projects.description: Designed a prototype BLDC motor and Atmel-based controller writing all of the SW and printing the motor prototype

items.description: Designed the BLDC motor all working components purchasing bearings and magnets for the rotor, hall-effect sensors for the position sensing and designing the rest in Fusion 360
Printed the motor rotor and stator housing components, wrapped the electromagnets and assembled the motor
Designed the controller using an Atmega 32M1 MCU with opto-isolators, transistor H-bridge and RS232 communication circuit. Soldered the prototype circuit on breadboard for initial testing

Wrote the primary commutation algorithm to power the necessary electromagnets based on the desired direction and hall effect position sensor inputs. Wrote a simple command-line-based tool to control the direction and speed of the controller using RS232 serial communication. Had two closed-loop modes - position and velocity

projects.name: Electric actuator
projects.description: Electric actuator used to control the wastegate on a turbocharger for small gasoline engines in China

items.description: Designed the PCB that held the hall effect position and temperature sensors as well as the back-emf voltage spike filter

Created a business case for starting the project including the anticipated volumes and revenues, timeline and costs. Developed a detailed project plan in Project to include every stage of the product development. Worked as project manager tracking action items and updating the project plan
Created a multiple test fixtures to test components and the finished product
Lead a team of engineers - mechanical design, electrical and validation, assuring timely and quality delivery
Using an Arduino, wrote the PID control algorithms used to move the actuator to various set points on a cycle
Plotted test data and analyzed the overall performance of the actuator to make sure it met the required specifications of the product
Created dynamics model to simulate the movement of the actuator as a 4-bar linkage attached to the turbo valve including inertia

projects.name: Hub inspection
projects.description: ARi was awarded project to check for cracks in wheel hubs of over 1000 heavy trucks in the field in North America

items.description: Looking at historical data and forecasted inspections, determined estimated completion dates to finish all 1000 truck inspections. Calculated failure percentages based on the field data. Performed engineer travel route optimizations
Created an Access database for the project used for billing the customer, tracking machine measurements and internal costs and efficiencies
Supervised team of four field engineers conducting NDT measurements investigating for cracks. Helped schedule travel around all of North America including the far north reaches of Canada.
Created machinery location footprint maps to show the density of populations around North America as well as status trends showing rate of inspections

projects.name: Test facility architectural concept
projects.description: Our company needed a concept to show a foreign government the plans to build a new facility for engineers to develop engines and heavy machinery

items.description: Supported the design direction of the facility making changes as needed
Made a presentation to show various angles and features of the facility model to give to management to present to the government parties interested in the development
Instructing a team member to design the facility in Sketchup giving the requirements and providing feedback

projects.name: Dyno and throttle control SW
projects.description: The test cell dyno and engine throttle are controlled by PID controllers

items.description: Created PID control algorithm to control the signal sent to the engine throttle using Visual Basic. Created different modes based on type of engine - speed or fuel controlled

projects.name: Actuator calibration bench
projects.description: Test bench used to calibrate position sensor and test acuracy of actuator

items.description: Worked with offshore team to write python UI to control the actuator to various positions to use external calibration module for the position sensor IC. Worked with ME to design fixture and fab team to assemble.
Designed H-bridge circuit to control the motor in both directions to interact with Arduino
Wrote portion of embedded SW to take commands and move actuator to specified position

projects.name: Web configuration tool for collision avoidance
projects.description: Web configuration tool used by our customer to configure one of their gateway controllers

items.description: Managed one other team member to style, implement google Protobuff messaging format and maintain the tool

Built Angular/Ionic application that communicates with the controller to view and update vehicle information regarding collision avoidance. Designed the application to allow easy field type configuration using abstract markup and static json properties

projects.name: Engine steady-state plotter
projects.description: Tool to visualize engine steady-state data

items.description: Wrote VBA script to port in new SS engine data files into  project file, add calculations and update plots to evaluate engine health

projects.name: Actuator test bench
projects.description: Test bench used to apply a constant load to an electric actuator using control SW to control the position.

items.description: Designed a coil spring to mimic the application torque on the actuator capable of handling multiple cycles at elevated temperatures

Using the position sensor feedback and motor controller output, created a PID controller to command the actuator to follow an application-based test cycle including the ability to repeat the cycle for as long as desired
Worked with app team to develop a Python-based UI to: select a test cycle, start and pause the cycle and plot the position and temperature during operation
Created an electrical schematic for controlling the actuator motor, reading the position sensor and two temperature sensors

projects.name: Inventory reduction
projects.description: Multiple consulting teams set up to find ways to reduce inventory throughout the supply chain - purchased, manufacturing WiP and finished goods

items.description: Created a root cause diagram to show where the waste was located throughout the manufacturing process
Mapped out the manufacturing process for multiple assembled components to determine areas of waste
Analyze WiP components to calculate necessary vs. actual inventory levels
